      • getNotes

        public java.lang.String getNotes()
        Description copied from interface: Contact
        Returns our notes about the contact, if any. If we have not written anything about the contact, the empty string is returned.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a string with notes about the contact, maybe empty.
